dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT (SELECT order_release_refnum_value FROM order_release_refnum WHERE order_release_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%LOC_CODE%' AND order_release_gid = orr.order_release_gid) loc_code_value FROM order_release ore, order_release_refnum orr, order_release_status ors WHERE 1 = 1 AND ore.order_release_xid LIKE 'SE%' AND ore.order_release_gid = orr.order_release_gid AND orr.order_release_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR.RELATED PO NUMBER' AND ore.order_release_gid = ors.order_release_gid AND (ors.status_type_gid LIKE '%CONTINUE_PRINTING_IN_CROSS_REPORTS%' AND ors.status_value_gid LIKE '%CONTINUE_PRINTING_IN_CROSS_REPORTS_YES%')

SELECT ore.order_release_xid so_number, ore.total_weight so_weight, orr1.order_release_refnum_value Loc_Code, (SELECT TO_CHAR (insert_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') FROM ob_order_base WHERE order_base_gid = ore.order_base_gid) Insert_date, GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_UTILITY_PKG.xxscou_get_ord_rel_item_fcn ( ore.order_release_gid) Item, GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_UTILITY_PKG.xxscou_get_ordrel_idesc_fcn ( ore.order_release_gid) Item_desc, (SELECT ore1.order_release_xid FROM order_release ore1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND ore1.order_release_xid = orr.order_release_refnum_value) po_number, (SELECT ore1.total_weight FROM order_release ore1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND ore1.order_release_xid = orr.order_release_refnum_value) po_weight, NVL ( (SELECT SUM (ore2.total_weight) FROM order_release ore2 WHERE ore2.order_release_gid IN (SELECT order_release_gid FROM order_release_refnum orr1 WHERE orr1.order_release_refnum_value = orr.order_release_refnum_value AND orr1.order_release_gid LIKE '%SE%' AND orr1.order_release_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR.RELATED PO NUMBER')), 0) - NVL ( (SELECT ore1.total_weight FROM order_release ore1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND ore1.order_release_xid = orr.order_release_refnum_value), 0) difference FROM order_release ore, order_release_refnum orr, order_release_refnum orr1, order_release_status ors WHERE 1 = 1 AND ore.order_release_xid LIKE 'SE%' AND ore.order_release_gid = orr.order_release_gid AND orr1.order_release_gid = ore.order_release_gid AND orr1.order_release_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%LOC_CODE%' AND orr1.order_release_refnum_value = :loc_code_value AND orr.order_release_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR.RELATED PO NUMBER' AND ore.order_release_gid = ors.order_release_gid AND (ors.status_type_gid LIKE '%CONTINUE_PRINTING_IN_CROSS_REPORTS%' AND ors.status_value_gid LIKE '%CONTINUE_PRINTING_IN_CROSS_REPORTS_YES%')
select trim(to_char(sysdate,'FMDay,Month DD, yyyy ')) CURR_DATE from dual
